contentList.content: Additionally, Sneak Attack can also be used as a reaction on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Spell Attacks</LSTag> to add Force damage on hit.
In addition, when you deal damage, the lowest result you can roll on the die is [1].
Your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Sneak_Attack">Sneak Attack</LSTag> deals an additional [1] per Sneak Attack die.
